title: New: Bat and Ball – Worth
body:
London five piece **Bat and Ball** have proven pretty versatile with their releases – a trait that’s relatively rare amongst ‘new’ artists.

Their latest track, _Worth_, feels as much indebted to London Grammar as it does Portishead, there’s an almost unnerving elegance and poise to it that’s utterly majestic. Check it out below.
